Author: Nithishrish23
Message:
US-01: Add new task functionality

Frontend:
- Add task input form with submit button
- Display task list
- Integrate with backend API

Backend:
- Implement POST /api/tasks endpoint
- Add in-memory task storage
- Return task with ID, name, status, created_at

Message:

Author: lingesh-Codedtx
Message:
US-07: Persist tasks using localStorage

Frontend:
- Load tasks from localStorage on app mount
- Auto-save tasks to localStorage on any change
- Fallback to API if localStorage is empty
- Tasks persist after page refresh

Backend:
- No changes (already persists in memory)

Author: Nithishrish23
Message:
US-08: Filter tasks by status (All/Pending/Completed)

Frontend:
- Add filter buttons (All, Pending, Completed)
- Update task display based on selected filter
- Active filter highlighted with blue background

Backend:
- Add query parameter support to GET /api/tasks
- Filter tasks by status when ?status=pending or ?status=completed

Author: Nithishrish23
Message:
US-10: Polish UI with responsive design
Frontend:

Fully responsive layout for mobile, tablet, and desktop
Improved visual hierarchy with better spacing
Enhanced color scheme with gradients
Better touch targets for mobile users
Smooth transitions and hover effects
Empty state with icon
Professional shadows and rounded corners
Optimized button sizes for different screens

Design improvements:

Mobile-first approach
Readable typography across all devices
Consistent padding and margins
Accessible form controls
